intro_text: Love Dota 2? Dream of earning from your skill? You're in the right place. Compete in real-money tournaments with fair matchmaking and smart anti-abuse systems.
footer_text: We’ve built a fair and rewarding platform where skill truly pays off. Log in, play hard, and earn real rewards from your passion.

eligibility.title: 📜 Eligibility Requirements
eligibility.subtitle: To participate in tournaments, your Steam account must meet these instructions:
eligibility.req_3: ⏳ It may take up to 1 hour to approve your account after making it public
eligibility.how_title: How to make your profile public:
eligibility.step_1: Go to your Steam profile and click Edit Profile.
eligibility.step_3: Set My profile to Public and Game details to Public.
eligibility.step_4: Open Dota 2, go to Settings → Account.
eligibility.step_5: Check Expose Public Match Data and Share Match History.

profile.not_eligible: To participate in tournaments this user needs to follow instructions

tournaments.title: Tournaments
tournaments.none: No tournaments available at the moment.
